trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9DocumentDescription class defines the description of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
The Pkcs9DocumentDescription constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentDescription"></xref> class.

The Pkcs9DocumentDescription constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentDescription"></xref> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded description of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
An array of byte values that specifies the encoded description of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

The Pkcs9DocumentDescription constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentDescription"></xref> class by using the specified description of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
An instance of the <xref:System.String> class that specifies the description for the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentDescription> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The DocumentDescription property retrieves the document description.
A <xref:System.String> object that contains the document description.
